trans-unit.source: Enables Windows Forms controls to be bound to ADO recordsets.
trans-unit.target: 可讓 Windows Form 控制項繫結至 ADO 資料錄集。

trans-unit.source: This type is a managed equivalent of the Visual Basic 6.0 msbind library.
trans-unit.target: 這個型別是 Visual Basic 6.0 msbind 文件庫的 managed 對等項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether data has changed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料是否已變更。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data has changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料已變更，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a data field.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料欄位。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> that contains the data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref>包含資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data format for a data field.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料欄位的資料格式。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp"> </xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by an <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by an <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"></xref> and, optionally, releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"> </xref> ，並選擇性地釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`disposing 參數設定為具有方法`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with the `disposing` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`參數設定為`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法會釋放任何參考這個控制項的 managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key value for a data field.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料欄位的索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> that contains the key value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> ，其中包含的索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a data object.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，其中包含資料。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of a property from a data object.
trans-unit.target: 從資料物件取得屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> that contains the property name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> ，其中包含屬性名稱。
